document.full_text: voters streamed into polling stations in india's west bengal state on monday in a local election that could see a populist maverick unseat the world longest-serving, democratically elected communist government and emerge as a key power broker.
document.title: a populist maverick battles india's communist bastion
lines_and_colors: voters streamed into polling stations in india's west bengal state on monday in a local election that could see a populist maverick unseat the world longest-serving, democratically elected communist government and emerge as a key power broker.
